title: A New and short defense of tabacco with the effectes of the same, and of the right vse thereof.
publisher: Printed by V.S. for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Holy Lambe in Paules Church-yard,
notes: Running title: A defence of tabacco.
